turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Hi, am I speaking with Kevin Nguyen?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: This is Lisa from Example Finance. Just need to confirm a couple of details. Can you confirm your date of birth?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Look, I'm done with you people. 23rd October 1988. Now what?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: And the postcode on your account?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thanks Kevin. I'm calling about an overdue balance of $2,450. We haven't been able to reach you about this.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: You've been calling every single day! I told the last person I lost my job. Nobody listens. I want to speak to a manager.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I'm sorry to hear about your job situation, Kevin. I can definitely help you with options. Before I transfer you, can I understandâ€”

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: No. I want a manager. Now. I've explained this five times and nothing changes. I'm getting calls at all hours. It's harassment.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I understand you're frustrated, and I apologise for the experience. I can transfer you to my team leader. Can I first put a hold on your account so no further calls go out while we sort this?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Fine. Do that. But I still want to talk to someone senior.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Absolutely. I'm placing a 7-day hold on collection activity now. I'll transfer you to my team leader, Sarah. She'll be able to review your account properly. Just hold the line for a moment.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Thank you. Finally someone taking this seriously.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I'm transferring you now. Sarah will be with you shortly.
